title: Early social behaviour
creator_contributor_role: Yale Clinic of Child Development, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Personality development
description: Shows the manifestation of the infant personality in a variety of social settings. Ten different children from 8 weeks to 7 years of age are studied and individual differences are emphasised. Also the social significance of the household is conveyed by scenes that reflect parent-child relationships.
